name: Paracetamol 500mg

description: Blood thinner and pain reliever. Used to prevent heart attacks and strokes.

description: Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) for pain, fever, and inflammation.

description: Antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.

name: Cetirizine 10mg
description: Antihistamine for allergy relief. Treats hay fever, hives, and itching.

name: Omeprazole 20mg
description: Proton pump inhibitor for acid reflux and stomach ulcers.

name: Vitamin D3 60000 IU
description: Vitamin D supplement for bone health and immunity.

description: Antioxidant vitamin for immune support and overall health.

name: Azithromycin 500mg
description: Antibiotic for respiratory and ear infections.

description: Diabetes medication to control blood sugar levels.
